TypeSignature.Value: Public MustInherit Class SQLiteProgram Inherits SQLiteClosable
public ref class SQLiteProgram abstract : Android::Database::Sqlite::SQLiteClosable
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SQLiteProgram extends Android.Database.Sqlite.SQLiteClosable

Docs.summary: A base class for compiled SQLite programs.

remarks.para: A base class for compiled SQLite programs.
This class is not thread-safe.
